memberdef.argsstring: (string Name_, Camera3 &camera_address, short no_of_items, Vector3 Item1_pos, short Item1_bounds, Vector3 Item2_pos, short Item2_bounds)
memberdef.name: Init

parameterdescription.para: - number of items required to complete the quest

listitem.para: check if quest has been taken or should be started

parameterdescription.para: - if true, quest is taken, if false, quest is not taken

listitem.para: get the current progress of the quest

simplesect.para: - which stage of the quest is the player currently at

memberdef.argsstring: (float position_x, float position_z, float bounds_x, float bounds_z, float cameraposition_x, float cameraposition_z)
memberdef.name: boundscheck

listitem.para: bounds check if player is within range to pick up item

simplesect.para: true - player is within the bounds
false - player is not within the bounds

listitem.para: get number of items the quest requires

simplesect.para: the number of items required in the quest

listitem.para: check if first item has been picked up

simplesect.para: true - first item has been picked up
false - first item has not been picked up

listitem.para: check if second item has been picked up

simplesect.para: true - second item has been picked up
false - second item has not been picked up

listitem.para: Quest system used to help create a flow of quests easily in the game
